scheduledQueryRules.name: Azure VM Heartbeat Missing
scheduledQueryRules.conditionQuery:
InsightsMetrics 
| where Namespace == 'Computer'
    and Name == 'Heartbeat'
    and SourceSystem == 'Insights'
    and Origin == 'vm.azm.ms'
| summarize MinSinceLastHeartbeat = datetime_diff('minute', now(), max(TimeGenerated)) by ResourceId=_ResourceId, Computer
//output: ResourceId,Computer, MinSinceLastHeartbeat

scheduledQueryRules.name: Azure VM Memory Low
scheduledQueryRules.conditionQuery:
let TimeWindow = ago(5m);
let Percentile = 90;
InsightsMetrics
| where TimeGenerated > TimeWindow
    and Origin == 'vm.azm.ms'
    and Namespace == 'Memory'
    and Name == 'AvailableMB'
| summarize
    AvailableMB = percentile(Val, Percentile),
    arg_max(TimeGenerated, Tags)
    by ResourceId = _ResourceId,Computer
| extend MemorySizeMB = toreal(parse_json(Tags)['vm.azm.ms/memorySizeMB'])
| project TimeGenerated, Computer, ResourceId, AvailableMB = round(AvailableMB), MemorySizeMB = round(MemorySizeMB), PercentFree = round(100 * AvailableMB / MemorySizeMB, 1)

scheduledQueryRules.name: Azure VM CPU Utilization High
scheduledQueryRules.conditionQuery:
let TimeWindow = ago(5m);
let Percentile = 90;
InsightsMetrics
| where TimeGenerated > TimeWindow and Origin == 'vm.azm.ms' and Namespace == 'Processor' and Name == 'UtilizationPercentage'
| summarize
    UtilizationPercentage = percentile(Val, Percentile),
    arg_max(TimeGenerated, Tags)
  by ResourceId = _ResourceId,Computer
| extend CoreCount = toint(parse_json(Tags)['vm.azm.ms/totalCpus'])
| project TimeGenerated, Computer, ResourceId, UtilizationPercentage = round(UtilizationPercentage), CoreCount

scheduledQueryRules.name: Azure VM Volume Free Space Low
scheduledQueryRules.conditionQuery:
let TimeWindow = ago(5m);
let Percentile = 90;
InsightsMetrics
| where TimeGenerated > TimeWindow and Origin == 'vm.azm.ms' and Namespace == 'LogicalDisk' and Name == 'FreeSpaceMB'
| extend tags = parse_json(Tags)
| extend MountId = tostring(tags['vm.azm.ms/mountId']),
    DiskSizeMB = toreal(tags['vm.azm.ms/diskSizeMB'])
| summarize
    TimeGenerated = max(TimeGenerated),
    FreeSpaceMB = percentile(Val, Percentile),
    DiskSizeMB = any(DiskSizeMB)
  by ResourceId = _ResourceId, Computer,MountId
| project TimeGenerated, Computer, ResourceId, MountId, FreeSpaceMB = round(FreeSpaceMB), DiskSizeMB = round(DiskSizeMB), PercentFree = round(100 * FreeSpaceMB / DiskSizeMB, 1)

scheduledQueryRules.name: Azure SQL VM Volume Space Low
scheduledQueryRules.conditionQuery:
let TimeWindow = 15m;
InsightsMetrics
| where TimeGenerated > ago(TimeWindow)
| where Origin == 'solutions.azm.ms/telegraf/SqlInsights'
| where Namespace == 'sqlserver_volume_space'
| where Name == 'total_space_bytes'
| extend Resource = tostring(parsejson(Tags).server_name)
| extend Instance = tostring(parsejson(Tags).sql_instance)
| extend Volume = tostring(parsejson(Tags).volume_mount_point)
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,VolSize=Val) by bin(TimeGenerated,TimeWindow),Computer,Resource,Instance,Volume,_ResourceId
| join kind=leftouter (
InsightsMetrics
| where TimeGenerated > ago(TimeWindow)
| where Origin == 'solutions.azm.ms/telegraf/SqlInsights'
| where Namespace == 'sqlserver_volume_space'
| where Name == 'available_space_bytes'
| extend Resource = tostring(parsejson(Tags).server_name)
| extend Instance = tostring(parsejson(Tags).sql_instance)
| extend Volume = tostring(parsejson(Tags).volume_mount_point)
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,Val) by bin(TimeGenerated,TimeWindow),Computer,Resource,Instance,Volume,_ResourceId
) on Computer,Resource,Instance,Volume,_ResourceId
| extend FreeSpacePercentage = round((Val/VolSize)*100,2)
| project TimeGenerated,MonitorServer=Computer,Computer=Resource,Volume,Instance,FreeSpacePercentage,AvailableBytes=Val,VolumeSizeBytes=VolSize,ResourceId=_ResourceId

scheduledQueryRules.name: Azure SQL VM Page Life Expectancy Low
scheduledQueryRules.conditionQuery:
InsightsMetrics
| where TimeGenerated > ago(5m)
| where Origin == 'solutions.azm.ms/telegraf/SqlInsights'
| where Namespace == 'sqlserver_performance'
| extend Object = tostring(parsejson(Tags).object)
| where Object == 'SQLServer:Buffer Manager'
| extend Counter = tostring(parsejson(Tags).counter)
| where Counter == 'Page life expectancy'
| extend Resource = tostring(parsejson(Tags).sql_instance)
| extend PerfCounter = strcat(Object,':',Counter)
| summarize avg(Val) by bin(TimeGenerated,5m),Computer,Resource,PerfCounter,_ResourceId
| where avg_Val > 0
| project TimeGenerated,MonitorServer=Computer,Computer=Resource,PerfCounter,Val=avg_Val,ResourceId=_ResourceId

scheduledQueryRules.name: Azure SQL VM Allocated Max Memory High
scheduledQueryRules.conditionQuery:
let TimeWindow=24h;
InsightsMetrics
| where TimeGenerated > ago(TimeWindow)
| where Origin == 'solutions.azm.ms/telegraf/SqlInsights'
| where Namespace == 'sqlserver_server_properties'
| extend Object = tostring(parsejson(Tags).object)
| where Name == 'server_memory'
| extend Resource = tostring(parsejson(Tags).sql_instance)
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,Val) by Computer,Name,Resource,_ResourceId
| extend ServerGB=ceiling(Val/1024/1024)
| extend ReservedGB = iif(ServerGB > 16, toint(ceiling((((ServerGB-16)/4)+4))), 4)
| extend ReservedGB = iif(ServerGB <= 4, 1, ReservedGB)
| project ReservedGB,ServerGB,Computer,Resource,_ResourceId
| join kind=leftouter (
InsightsMetrics
| where TimeGenerated > ago(TimeWindow)
| where Origin == 'solutions.azm.ms/telegraf/SqlInsights'
| where Namespace == 'sqlserver_performance'
| extend Object = tostring(parsejson(Tags).object)
| where Object == 'SQLServer:Memory Manager'
| extend Counter = tostring(parsejson(Tags).counter)
| where Counter == 'Target Server Memory (KB)'
| extend Resource = tostring(parsejson(Tags).sql_instance)
| extend PerfCounter = strcat(Object,':',Counter)
| summarize arg_max(Val,TimeGenerated) by bin(TimeGenerated,TimeWindow),Computer,Resource,PerfCounter,_ResourceId
) on Computer,Resource,_ResourceId
| extend TargetGB = ceiling(Val/1024/1024)
| extend FreeMemoryGB = ServerGB-TargetGB
| where FreeMemoryGB < ReservedGB
| project TimeGenerated,MonitorServer=Computer,Computer=Resource,PerfCounter,FreeMemoryGB,RequiredMemoryGB=ReservedGB,ResourceId=_ResourceId

scheduledQueryRules.name: Azure SQL VM Database(s) Not Online
scheduledQueryRules.conditionQuery:
InsightsMetrics
| where TimeGenerated > ago(10m)
| where Origin == 'solutions.azm.ms/telegraf/SqlInsights'
| where Namespace == 'sqlserver_server_properties'
| where Name == 'db_online'
| extend Resource = tostring(parsejson(Tags).sql_instance)
| as DBOnlineTable
| summarize max(Val) by Computer,Resource,_ResourceId
| join kind=leftouter (DBOnlineTable) on Computer,Resource,_ResourceId
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, Val) by Computer,Resource,_ResourceId,max_Val
| where Val < max_Val
| project TimeGenerated,MonitorServer=Computer,Computer=Resource,HistoricDBOnlineCount=max_Val,CurrentDBOnlineCount=Val,ResourceId=_ResourceId

scheduledQueryRules.name: Azure SQL VM Log File Usage High
scheduledQueryRules.conditionQuery:
let TimeWindow = 30m;
InsightsMetrics
| where TimeGenerated > ago(TimeWindow)
| where Origin == 'solutions.azm.ms/telegraf/SqlInsights'
| where Namespace == 'sqlserver_performance'
| extend Object = tostring(parsejson(Tags).object)
| where Object == 'SQLServer:Databases'
| extend Counter = tostring(parsejson(Tags).counter)
| where Counter == 'Log File(s) Size (KB)'
| extend Resource = tostring(parsejson(Tags).sql_instance)
| extend Instance = tostring(parsejson(Tags).instance)
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,Val) by Computer,Resource,Instance,_ResourceId
| project Computer,Resource,Instance,LFSizeKB=Val,_ResourceId
| join kind=leftouter (
InsightsMetrics
| where TimeGenerated > ago(TimeWindow)
| where Origin == 'solutions.azm.ms/telegraf/SqlInsights'
| where Namespace == 'sqlserver_performance'
| extend Object = tostring(parsejson(Tags).object)
| where Object == 'SQLServer:Databases'
| extend Counter = tostring(parsejson(Tags).counter)
| where Counter == 'Log File(s) Used Size (KB)'
| extend Resource = tostring(parsejson(Tags).sql_instance)
| extend Instance = tostring(parsejson(Tags).instance)
| summarize arg_max(Val, TimeGenerated) by Computer,Resource,Instance,_ResourceId
| project Computer,Resource,Instance,LFUsedKB=Val,_ResourceId
) on Computer,Resource,Instance,_ResourceId
| extend PercentUsed = round((LFUsedKB/LFSizeKB)*100,2)
| project TimeGenerated=now(),MonitorServer=Computer,Computer=Resource,LFSizeKB,LFUsedKB,PercentUsed,ResourceId=_ResourceId

scheduledQueryRules.name: Azure Storage Account Egress High
Azure SQL VM Backup Job Not Run
scheduledQueryRules.conditionQuery:
let TimeWindow=48h;
InsightsMetrics
| where TimeGenerated > ago(TimeWindow)
| where Origin == 'solutions.azm.ms/telegraf/SqlInsights'
| where Namespace == 'sqlserver_performance'
| extend Object = tostring(parsejson(Tags).object)
| where Object == 'SQLServer:Databases'
| extend Counter = tostring(parsejson(Tags).counter)
| where Counter == 'Backup/Restore Throughput/sec'
| extend Resource = tostring(parsejson(Tags).sql_instance)
| extend Instance = tostring(parsejson(Tags).instance)
| extend PerfCounter = strcat(Object,':',Counter)
| summarize max(Val) by Computer,Resource,Instance,PerfCounter,_ResourceId
| project TimeGenerated=now(),MonitorServer=Computer,Computer=Resource,PerfCounter,BackupRestoreThroughput=max_Val,TimeWindow,ResourceId=_ResourceId

scheduledQueryRules.name: Azure VM Backup
scheduledQueryRules.conditionQuery:
AddonAzureBackupJobs
| where TimeGenerated >= ago(5m) 
| where JobOperation == 'Backup'
| where BackupManagementType == 'IaaSVM'
| where not(JobStatus has_any('Completed', 'CompletedWithWarnings'))
| extend RG = tostring(split(BackupItemUniqueId, ';')[3])
| extend Computer = tostring(split(BackupItemUniqueId, ';')[4])
| extend TimeGeneratedUTC = tostring(TimeGenerated)
| project JobUniqueId, ResourceId=_ResourceId,TimeGeneratedUTC, RG, Computer, JobOperation, Type, JobStatus, JobDurationInSecs
| summarize arg_max(TimeGeneratedUTC, *) by JobUniqueId

scheduledQueryRules.name: Azure SQL Database Storage Percent Usage High
